isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - ELECTRONIC ENGINES, DT-466E, I-530E AND T-444E - Description - BAP

svcproc.title: BAP
svcproc.para: The Barometric Air Pressure sensor (BAP) is a variable capacitance sensor, that when supplied with a 5 volt reference signal from the ECM, produces a linear analog voltage signal that varies with altitude. The BAP signal is used by the ECM to adjust timing and fuel quantity, to optimize engine operation and control smoke throughout all altitude conditions.
